title: Game Makers Sound Effects Kit 4 Pt.3
description: Introducing the pinnacle of game audio excellence: Game Makers Sound Effects Kit 4 Pt.3!
longDescription:
Audio demo


With over 4,000 meticulously crafted sound effects, all in pristine 44k 16bit .wav format. Designed for game, video, and motion graphics, this latest offering is the ultimate companion for creators at any level. Crafted by award-winning sound designers, Game Makers Sound Effects Kit 4 Pt.3 combines 4 meticulously curated sound libraries, ensuring an unrivaled audio experience. This game-ready arsenal is tailored specifically for game developers and sound designers, with UCS compliant file naming for effortless integration.



Bundle Includes:

Pirate Game Nautical Adventure Sound Effects Library $129

Humanoid Creatures 2 - Monster Vocalization Sound Sets $33.00

Humanoid Creatures 3 - Monster Vocalization Sound Sets $35.00

Fantasy World Loops 2 $29.00


Complete the bundle by purchasing:

Game Makers Sound Effects Kit 4 Pt.1

Game Makers Sound Effects Kit 4 Pt.2


Forge ahead with confidence using Game Makers Sound Effects Kit 4 Pt.3 as your guiding light in the realm of game audio. Uncover unparalleled sound quality and diversity that solidifies Kit 4 as an essential cornerstone in your sound studio arsenal. Seamlessly complementing GMSK1, GMSK2, and GMSK3, this latest installment expands the horizon, offering an extensive array of premium sounds essential for propelling your projects to extraordinary heights.


Experience the curated collection of crisp sounds for all levels of sound designers and game developers. Equipped with a wide range of top quality SFX that come production ready with purchase.


Product details:

Highly Versatile & Wide-Ranging Production Suite

4 Sound Libraries Total

4,000+ Game Ready/Production Ready Audio Assets

All SFX formatted in 44k 16bit .wav File

All SFX Royalty-Free

Includes rich Soundminer metadata for easier search

UCS compliant

Designed for games, video, & motion graphics

All SFX are compatible with ANY video editing software, DAW or game engine
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  4 Sound Libraries Total
  •  4,000+ Game Ready/Production Ready Audio Assets

Number of Audio Waves: 4,105

Number of Audio Cues: 4,105

Sample rate / bit rate: 44k 16bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 396

Supported Development Platforms:

Mac: Yes
